metadata.title: CVE-2020-8130 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
There is an OS command injection vulnerability in Ruby Rake < 12.3.3 inRake::FileList when supplying a filename that begins with the pipecharacter `|`.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8130` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rake - 10.5.0-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rake package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.5.0-2ubuntu0.1').
